title: First SMS
description: Neil Papworth sends 'Merry Christmas' via Orbitel TPU 900.

title: Cameras & Internet
description: First camera phones and internet-enabled devices appear.

title: Birth of Facebook
description: Mark Zuckerberg launches Facebook, revolutionizing social networking.

title: First iPhone
description: Apple launches iPhone, changing the smartphone landscape.

title: First Android
description: HTC launches the first Android phone, marking the start of Google’s smartphone era.

title: Rise of AI Assistants
description: The era of voice-powered AI begins with Apple's Siri in 2011, followed by Microsoft's Cortana and Amazon's Alexa in 2014, and Google Assistant in 2016. In 2022, ChatGPT ushers in a new wave of conversational AI, transforming how people interact with technology.

title: Rise of 5G
description: 5G networks bring ultra-fast connectivity to mobiles.
